trans-unit.source: Specifies the parts of a <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as partes de um <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used to identify the parts of a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada para identificar as partes de um <xref:System.Uri>.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada com o <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.UserInfo" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" />, and <see cref="P:System.Uri.Fragment" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.UserInfo" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" /> e <see cref="P:System.Uri.Fragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Fragment" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Fragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" /> and <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" /> e <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />.

trans-unit.source: If no port data is in the Uri and a default port has been assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, the default port is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dado de porta estiver no URI e uma porta padrão tiver sido atribuída ao <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, a porta padrão será retornada.

trans-unit.source: If there is no default port, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma porta padrão, -1 será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" />, and <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" /> e <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the delimiter should be included.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o delimitador deve ser incluído.

trans-unit.source: The normalized form of the <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />.
trans-unit.target: O formato normalizado do <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" /> and <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.LocalPath" /> e <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" />.

trans-unit.source: Also see <see cref="P:System.Uri.PathAndQuery" />.
trans-unit.target: Consulte também <see cref="P:System.Uri.PathAndQuery" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Query" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />, and <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" /> e <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />.

trans-unit.source: The complete <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> context that is needed for Uri Serializers.
trans-unit.target: O contexto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> completo necessário para os serializadores URI.

trans-unit.source: The context includes the IPv6 scope.
trans-unit.target: O contexto inclui o escopo do IPv6.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.UserInfo" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" />, and <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.UserInfo" />, <see cref="P:System.Uri.Host" /> e <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />.

trans-unit.source: If no port data is in the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> and a default port has been assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, the default port is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dado de porta estiver no <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> e uma porta padrão tiver sido atribuída ao <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, a porta padrão será retornada.

trans-unit.source: If there is no default port, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma porta padrão, -1 será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.Port" />.

trans-unit.source: If no port data is in the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> and a default port has been assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, the default port is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum dado de porta estiver no <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> e uma porta padrão tiver sido atribuída ao <see cref="P:System.Uri.Scheme" />, a porta padrão será retornada.

trans-unit.source: If there is no default port, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma porta padrão, -1 será retornado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Uri.UserInfo" /> data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados <see cref="P:System.Uri.UserInfo" />.
